metadata.title: CVE-2020-36781 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: i2c:imx: fix reference leak when pm_runtime_get_sync fails In i2c_imx_xfer()and i2c_imx_remove(), the pm reference count is not expected to beincremented on return. However, pm_runtime_get_sync will increment pmreference count even failed. Forgetting to putting operation will result ina reference leak here. Replace it with pm_runtime_resume_and_get to keepusage counter balanced.
